snippet: For Glen Doherty, killed Tuesday in the attack on a diplomatic compound in Libya, being assigned to a high-stakes security detail was just one of many adventurous overseas missions.
abstract: Military security contractor Glen A Doherty was one of the men killed along with American Ambassador J Christopher Stevens when militants stormed the diplomatic compound in Benghazi, Libya.
lead_paragraph: For Glen Doherty, killed Tuesday in the attack on a diplomatic compound in Libya, being assigned to a high-stakes security detail was just one of many adventurous overseas missions.

headline.seo: Glen Doherty, Killed in Libya, Led Life of Risks Overseas
headline.main: For Slain Contractor, a Life of Risks Overseas
headline.print_headline: For Slain Contractor, A Life of Risks Overseas
